title: 82/793/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 November 1982 approving the extended plan for the eradication of brucellosis in cattle put forward by Belgium (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 November 1982
approving the extended plan for the eradication of brucellosis in cattle put forward by Belgium
(Only the Dutch and French texts are authentic)
(82/793/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The extended plan for the eradication of brucellosis as applied by Belgium from 12 December 1981 is hereby approved.
Financial participation by the Community shall be in respect of eligible expenditure on account of slaughterings taking place on or after 12 December 1981.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 November 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
